personal_info.name: Mohammed Ashikur Rahman
personal_info.description: A dedicated and highly skilled professional with a passion for computer science, artificial intelligence, and cyber security.

primary_degree.description: Prestigious program that equipped me with foundational knowledge and skills needed to succeed in the rapidly evolving field of AI. Included industrial placement for real-world applications.

Honed skills in data analysis and reporting, providing critical support to business intelligence initiatives.
Gained hands-on experience in information technology and learned to apply academic knowledge in a corporate environment.

personality_traits.approach: Always eager to learn and take on new challenges, with a commitment to excellence in everything I do.
